```{r}
x <- file.path("extdata", "blobs.zarr")
x <- system.file(x, package="SpatialData")
blobs <- readSpatialData(x)
```

```{r}
shapes(blobs)$blobs_circles
```

```{r}
plotSpatialData() + 
    plotShape(blobs, i="blobs_circles")
```

```{r}
plotSpatialData() + 
    plotPoint(blobs, c="genes")
```

```{r}
plotSpatialData() + 
    plotLabel(blobs, i="blobs_labels")
```
